game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors of a lost artifact buried deep within an abandoned ruin. Your quest is to navigate the treacherous terrain, solve puzzles, and find the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a legendary weapon

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You need to discover the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins, marked by a specific symbol on a large boulder.
task.location: The forest west of the village

task.objective: Solve the puzzle at the entrance
task.description: You must decode the runes inscribed on the door to unlock the entrance. The answer lies in the nearby waterfall.
The ruins are a labyrinth of corridors and chambers. You must find your way to the heart of the ruin without getting lost or encountering dangers.
A powerful creature guards the artifact. You must defeat it to claim the treasure.
